snippet.title: YVY - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
An adventure autobattler game based on customizable dice rolls and rogue-lite elements, inspired by real events in 16th century Brazil. 

Build your own dice, strategically choosing each face, and defend the region of Pindó from the Whitecloak invaders!

🔗 Add YVY to your wishlist on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2952190/YVY/

🔗 Follow us on X
https://x.com/EliGDgames
